scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase functions:config:set app.url=http://localhost:3000 && firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deploy:test: firebase functions:config:set app.url=https://social-music-addd0.web.app && firebase deploy -P test --only functions
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase functions:config:set app.url=https://social-music-prod.web.app && firebase deploy -P prod --only functions
